patthana21.38:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.38:2.1_0: Naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.38:3.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:4.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
patthana21.38:5.1_1: Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
